pkgmetadata.longdescription: Synchrony in Motion Energy Analysis (MEA) Time-Series // A suite of tools useful to read, visualize and export bivariate motion energy time-series. Lagged synchrony between subjects can be analyzed through windowed cross-correlation. Surrogate data generation allows an estimation of pseudosynchrony that helps to estimate the effect size of the observed synchronization. Kleinbub, J. R., Ramseyer, F. T. (2020). rMEA: An R package to assess nonverbal synchronization in motion energy analysis time-series. Psychotherapy research, 1-14. doi:10.1080/10503307.2020.1844334.
